REPORT ygpl_transport_request MESSAGE-ID zaplink.
INCLUDE ygpl_transport_request_top. INCLUDE ygpl_transport_request_scr.
*/----------------------main------------------------------------------\ START-OF-SELECTION. PERFORM create_object_list. PERFORM get_components. CALL METHOD ygpl_tr_tools=>add_keys EXPORTING keys = keys transport_request = p_tr.
END-OF-SELECTION.
INCLUDE ygpl_transport_request_frm.

ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&PURPOSE& ASAdd components to transport request U1&INTEGRATION& AS U1&PREREQUISITES& AS U1&FEATURES& ASAdd from free selection using TADIR information ASOr Add from an other transport request U2&SELECTION& ASList of the selected components is displayed allowing user to change the selection manually U2&STANDARD_VARIANTS& AS U2&OUTPUT& AS U1&ACTIVITIES& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS

ITEM.ENTRY: Ajout de composants pour Ordre de Transport
Etendre au class de dev enfant
YGPL : Add components to Transport Requests
YGPL : Outil pour ajouter de composant en mass à Ordre de Transport
